value.title: How to create custom color themes - Power BI Tips & Tricks #34
value.excerpt: Do you want to create custom color themes in power bi? Power BI just announced a preview of report themes, which will allow you to quickly color your entire report to match a theme or corporate branding. When you import a theme, all your charts will automatically update to use the theme colors, and you‚Äôll

value.title: Power BI Tips & Tricks #07: Change multiple hardcoded path sources at once in Power BI

I am going to show you an easy way to solve this.  Here you can download the pbix file: http://trantor.synology.me:5000/fbsharing/nc9kfXTw

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending
